en-US.summary: A free radio service for the blind and visually impaired community of east central Illinois, provided by Illinois Public Media.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Illinois Radio Reader to play
en-US.name: My Radio
en-US.description:
Listen to My Radio, with less bla bla bla, and more la la la.

My Radio provides a high quality sound 24/7 with the best music.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch My Radio" or "Alexa, play Illinois Radio Reader" to start the radio".

At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop"
